about_desc: I'm a skilled software developer with experience in different programming languages TypeScript, JavaScript and Python, and expertise in frameworks like React, React Native for mobile, Node.js, and Flask. I'm a quick learner and collaborate closely with clients to create efficient, scalable, and user-friendly solutions that solve real-world problems. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!
exp_title: A bit more about my experience

projects_desc: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories and live demos in it. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

testimonials.testimonial: I have had the opportunity to work with Wilder on multiple occasions and it has always been a pleasure. He is a motivated person with a consistently positive attitude. Wilder excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until the problem at hand is solved.
I've never met a web developer who really cares about the success of their clients like Wilder does.
After Wilder optimized our applications, our traffic increased by 50%. We can't thank him enough!
